Package Utility

Class DateTimeAdjustment

java.lang.Object
Utility.DateTimeAdjustment
public abstract class DateTimeAdjustment extends Object
This class contains date time conversion methods and time checking methods. This allows the code to be cleaner and more concise.
Author:
Nicholas Staley

  • Method Details

    • changeToCurrentTimezone

      public static ZonedDateTime changeToCurrentTimezone(Instant recordedInstant)
      This method converts an instant to the zoned date time of the person using the program.
      Parameters:
      recordedInstant - The instant to be converted
      Returns:
      Returns a zoned date time of the instant that was supplied.

    • formatTime

      public static String formatTime(ZonedDateTime zonedTime)
      This method takes a zoned date time and converts it to a formatted string for use in the program.
      Parameters:
      zonedTime - The zoned date time supplied
      Returns:
      Returns a string of a formatted date and time.

    • convertStringToZoned

      public static ZonedDateTime convertStringToZoned(String inputTime)
      This method converts a string to a zoned date time of the system that is running the program.
      Parameters:
      inputTime - the string input time that is to be converted
      Returns:
      Returns a zoned date time of the string that was supplied.

    • getHour

      public static String getHour(ZonedDateTime timeInput)
      This method takes a zoned date time and returns a string of the hour of the time provided.
      Parameters:
      timeInput - The zoned date time to be converted
      Returns:
      Returns a string of the hour of the supplied zoned date time.

    • getMinute

      public static String getMinute(ZonedDateTime timeInput)
      This method takes a zoned date time and returns a string of the minutes in the zoned date time.
      Parameters:
      timeInput - The zoned date time to be converted
      Returns:
      Returns a string of the minutes of the supplied zoned date time.

    • amCheck

      public static boolean amCheck(ZonedDateTime timeInput)
      This method checks if the zoned date time is in the am.
      Parameters:
      timeInput - The zoned date time to be checked
      Returns:
      Returns a true boolean if the supplied time is in the am or false if it is pm.

    • checkBusinessHours

      public static InputErrorCheck checkBusinessHours(ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end)
      This method checks to see if the supplied appointment start and end times falls between the business hours of 08:00 and 22:00 est.
      Parameters:
      start - The start time of the appointment
      end - The end time of the appointment
      Returns:
      Returns an InputErrorCheck with a false boolean if the appointment was between business hour or a true boolean and error message if the appointment falls outside business hours.
